Wear socks made of thicker materials: Socks made of thicker materials like wool or cashmere can provide some warmth and protection to your feet.
Use foot warmers: Disposable or reusable foot warmers can be a quick and easy solution to keep your feet warm and comfortable.
Use a foot massager: A foot massager can help keep your feet warm and relaxed, which can help reduce the risk of blisters and other foot problems.
Use a footrest: A footrest can help keep your feet elevated and reduce the risk of pressure points and foot pain.
Wear sandals: Sandals can provide some protection to your feet and can also help keep them cool and comfortable.
